column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Hold your breath when you walk from the modern front vestibule to the main dining room. It is one incredible reveal- One Yelper said the atmosphere was all "boozy
column2: schmoozy" and I can't think of better adjectives! The sexy lighting will make just about anyone look movie-star perfect and the jazzy tunes add to the supper club vibe.
